我是谁

方睿，花名`以牧`，阿里巴巴口碑无线开发工程师，现居上海。

My name is Fang (Ray) Rui, as an Alibaba mobile development engineer with 4 years working experiences (since 2014). Now I'm living with my wife in Shanghai, China.
